title: Splintercell Blacklist (3 Discs) (RGH/JTAG) - Read Description
description:
THIS TORRENT IS FOR THE PEOPLE WHO HAVE AN RGH/JTAG XBOX 360 CONSOLE! IT INCLUDES ALL 3 DISCS AND CAN BE CONVERTED INTO GAMES ON DEMAND OR ISO FORMAT IF YOU PREFER.





This is a backup copy of Splintercell Blacklist for the Xbox 360. All I did was install the games to My USB thumb drive, then transfer it to my computer for you to download.


Simply 


1. Download "Horizon" from  
   <a href="
http://horizon.soft32.com/free-download/?lp=adwords&tg=us&kw=Horizon+xbox+360&mt=p&ad=26062717278&pl=&ds=s&gclid=CLKvqqj_uLsCFWMV7Aod4mkApw" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://horizon.soft32.com/free-download/?lp=adwords&tg=us&kw=Horizon+xbox+360&mt=p&ad=26062717278&pl=&ds=s&gclid=CLKvqqj_uLsCFWMV7Aod4mkApw</a> 


2. Insert your pre-formatted USB Thumb Drive into your computer

3. RIGHT CLICK on Horizon and run as an administrator



4. **INSTALLING DISC 1**

Click "Inject File" and choose the 44kb file included in the folder "Splintercell Blacklist Disc 1" and Horizon will transfer and install the game onto your USB.


5. **INSTALLING DISC 2**

Click "Inject File" and choose the 44kb file included in the folder "Splintercell Blacklist Disc 2" and Horizon will transfer and install the game onto your USB.
   

6. **INSTALLING HD TEXTURES**

Click "Inject File" and choose the file included in the folder "Splintercell Blacklist HD Textures" and Horizon will transfer and install the game onto your USB.



SIDE NOTE: You can also install this straight to your Xbox 360 Hard Drive by using a program called "Xport 360".



I will be uploading a few games a month but please be patient as my internet isn't the fastest.



              ENJOY!

                    BlindSniper07
